text: Six months ago

Yeah, neither do I. Luckily I had my friend Brody.
Who, when I was having a really shitty day six months ago. Came to my apartment dragged me out of bed
And he brought me right here into this gym on this bike and he forced me to sweat
I remember looking up to him and thinking to myself what if I do this every day for the next hundred days
Told him the idea. Brody was instantly down. I pulled out my phone and I announced day one of 100 days of sweat

And as I kept up with the challenge and shared my daily progress on Instagram
I started noticing more and more people also committing to the challenge and also sharing on Instagram how it was going for them
I started getting tons of emails, messages, dms, videos of people sharing with me
why 100 days of sweat was so powerful and getting them to commit and the secret is very simple. Just set the absolute minimum
requirement of what counts as a sweat and stick to that. For me personally in my minimum
requirement was just one drop of sweat to touch the ground regardless how long that took that could take five minutes that could take two
hours as long as one drop of sweat touch the ground
then I was good, and all of a sudden we had thousands of people all over the world

Number 2

It could be whatever it takes to drop a sweat. just do it! and that will give you the first check
